snippet: DOPPELT--Ellie. The members of Brae Burn Country Club mourn the passing of our esteemed member Ellie Doppelt. Our sympathy is extended to her entire family. Paul Friedman, President Douglas Simon, Secretary 1/3
lead_paragraph: DOPPELT--Ellie. The members of Brae Burn Country Club mourn the passing of our esteemed member Ellie Doppelt. Our sympathy is extended to her entire family. Paul Friedman, President Douglas Simon, Secretary 1/3
